name: Alo Yoga
brandStory:
About Alo Yoga

RESPONSIBLE SOURCING ALO'S COMMITMENT TO WORKPLACE STANDARDS We build our products on an ethical foundation that honors human rights through every step of the process. As long-time supporters of ethical working conditions, in July 2025, ALO joined the Fair Labor Association (FLA), an international network of companies, universities, and civil society organizations collaborating to ensure that millions of people working at the world’s factories and farms are paid fairly and protected from risks to their health, safety, and well-being. This decision reflects both our values and our long-term vision. Over the next five years, we will undergo the FLA’s rigorous Accreditation process, which evaluates not just policies but how effectively they are implemented in practice. This includes: Strengthening our social compliance program to align with globally respected standards; Ensuring independent monitoring of our supply chain to identify and address risks; Building management systems for remediation, worker empowerment, and training; Demonstrating transparency through public reporting and FLA verification To reinforce this commitment, we are investing in a dedicated Social Compliance team to lead and implement these programs.

name: SKIMS
brandStory:
About SKIMS

SKIMS is a solutions-oriented brand creating the next generation of underwear, loungewear and shapewear. We are setting new standards by providing solutions for every body. From technically constructed shapewear that enhances your curves to underwear that stretches to twice its size, our goal is to consistently innovate on the past and advance our industry for the future.

name: Princess Polly
brandStory:
About Princess Polly

THE STORY SO FAR Our obsession with bringing the latest looks to everyday trendsetters goes way back to 2010, when Princess Polly first burst onto the online retail scene from a beachside apartment on Australia’s Gold Coast. Humble beginnings aside, the goal has always been to provide on-trend, quality fashion to our customers with the best customer service they’ve ever had. Behind the brand is a thriving team of 300 (and counting!) super passionate, innovative and creative individuals collaborating across our headquarters in West Hollywood (California, USA) and Burleigh Heads (Queensland, Australia). From designers, content creators, marketers, photographers (and everything in between), our dedicated team is what brings the Princess Polly you know and love to life. Want in on this? Your dream job could be here Opens a new window.

name: Vuori
brandStory:
About Vuori

A New Perspective On Performance Apparel™ Vuori makes premium performance apparel inspired by the active Coastal California lifestyle; an integration of fitness, surf, sport, and art. We’re evolving the definition of traditional activewear. Celebrating A Decade Of Vuori Back in 2015, we set out with a simple yet powerful vision: to build a brand that reflected the values we hold dear—connection, balance, and the pursuit of an extraordinary life. We obsessed over fabrics, designed with intention, and rooted ourselves in community. It was never just about the clothes.

name: Tula Skincare
brandStory:
About Tula Skincare

Welcome to TULA About Us TULA understands that a busy life can take a toll on skin—our name even means “balance” in Sanskrit. That’s why our doctor-founded skincare is designed to replenish what’s lost. Each formula features a super blend of probiotic extracts and nourishing ingredients, clinically proven to revive tired skin, boost hydration, and restore balance for a healthy, radiant glow. name: Colleen Rothschild
brandStory:
About Colleen Rothschild

Our Mission We are committed to providing our customers with the highest-quality skincare, hair care, makeup, and beauty products that are formulated with the finest sourced ingredients and the latest technologies. Our Founder Colleen Rothschild is the driving force behind Colleen Rothschild Beauty. Long known as the beauty industry’s secret weapon, Colleen spent much of her career creating acclaimed products for dermatologists, estheticians, and well-renowned beauty brands worldwide. With over 30 years of experience in the beauty industry, Colleen has refined her ability to combine science and technology with botanicals and luxury skincare. Formulated to cater to the modern and busy lifestyle, our skincare line is crafted to adapt effortlessly to your skin's ever-changing needs and concerns.

name: Merit Beauty
brandStory:
About Merit Beauty

Skip to content NEW — RETROSPECT 60ML. FREE RETURNS AND SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $40 THE SIGNATURE BAG SHIPS FREE WITH EVERY FIRST ORDER. SHOP ALL SETS COMPLEXION CHEEKS EYES LIPS SKINCARE FRAGRANCE LOGIN CART 0 ITEMS IN CART About Us Founded in 2021, MERIT is a modern beauty brand that simplifies what it takes to get ready. Born out of an industry crowded with fleeting trends and products that demanded expert-level skills, MERIT was created as the antidote — a considered collection designed to bring ease to your everyday. With a timeless perspective on beauty and a commitment to uncompromising quality, we create beauty and lifestyle essentials that become signatures of your routine — products you’ll reach for daily and live with for years to come.

That’s why we have spent the last 20 years pioneering a new category of beauty that’s all about exciting, high-quality SPF that feels so incredible and is so versatile, you’ll be reaching for it 365 days a year. WE’VE INNOVATED MORE THAN 40 FEEL-GOOD, DERM-TESTED FORMULAS for every skin type, tone, age, and step in your routine, so you can find the one that’s absolutely perfect for you. From SPF moisturizers and body lotions to primers and skin tints, we’ve led the way to make wearing sunscreen effortless and enjoyable. EVERY PRODUCT DELIVERS PREMIUM SKINCARE BENEFITS that help to prevent visible signs of aging like fine lines, wrinkles, dryness, and dark spots – and, equally importantly, reduce your risk of skin cancer.

name: Brooklinen
brandStory:
About Brooklinen

It all started with a great bed. Founded in Brooklyn in 2014, we disrupted the bedding industry with premium, hotel-quality sheets and towels at accessible prices, direct to your door. Over a decade in, we're still combining creative design with premium fabrics from the best manufacturers so our bedding, bath, and home accessories work for the way you really live.
